channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-12643] For self describing InputFormat don't replicate schema information in partitions
item.description:
Since self describing Input Formats don't use individual partition schemas for schema resolution, there is no need to send that info to tasks.
Doing this should cut down plan size.
item.summary: For self describing InputFormat don't replicate schema information in partitions

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12804105 - PreCommit-HIVE-MASTER-Build
mmccline Can you also please take a look at this one? ndembla tried it out and reported this gives us a speed-up in query compile time.

I've tested a slightly modified version of the patch. Original changes to following files were rejected

  • ql/src/java/org/apache/hadoop/hive/ql/optimizer/physical/Vectorizer.java
  • ql/src/java/org/apache/hadoop/hive/ql/exec/MapOperator.java

And following file needed modifications

  • ql/src/java/org/apache/hadoop/hive/ql/plan/PartitionDesc.java
